alert.note: Alert for Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 30 at 6:28PM CDT until March 30 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE...WESTERN CRAWFORD...EASTERN JASPER AND NORTHEASTERN RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ste. Marie, or 8 miles east of Newton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oblong, Hardinville and Robinson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
